message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $7,500 is a bit above my budget. I'm happy to buy the product for $7,000.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $7,000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $7,250.
